X.v.1.D.4.h
.
Alternate Order of Testimony and Questioning
Some representatives may ask that the witness testify immediately after the claimant and that all witnesses complete testimony
before
any questioning by the hearing official.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D  - Regional Office (RO) Hearings
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section D
